# entity

**Instance Property**

The entity the receiver is associated with

## Declaration

```swift
var entity: (any HasCollision)? { get set }
```

## Using the gesture recognizer

- **location(in:)**: Returns the unprojected location of the gesture represented by the receiver in the space of the given entity.

items.description: Returns the unprojected location of the gesture represented by the receiver in the space of the given entity.
